# WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver

**Protocol**

The methods to adopt in an object that monitors changes to a webpage’s cookies.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Adopt the methods of the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStoreObserver] protocol to track changes to cookies associated with a webpage. To observe the actual cookie changes, call the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore/add(_:)] method of the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore] you use to manage cookies. When a cookie changes, the cookie store notifies all observers of the changes.

## Responding to Cookie Changes

- **cookiesDidChange(in:)**: Tells the delegate that the cookies in the specified cookie store changed.

## Observing cookie store changes

- **add(_:)**: Adds an observer to the cookie store.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes an observer from the cookie store.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Adds an observer to the cookie store.
items.name: add(_:)
